page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN AMMANFORD
page.content: The people of the Ammanford area work in 3 sectors of industry. There are those who work in the Primary Sector, working in coal (at Betws Drift Mine), limestone (at the Llandybie Quarry), or as farmers. There are those who work in the Secondary Sector, employed in factories such as Corgy making knitwear, Llan making concrete blocks and Pulmaflex making car parts. Others are Tertiary Employees working in the shops, banks and offices. Unfortunately many jobs have been lost in recent years in all 3 sectors. eg. Saron Open Cast Mine, John White Footwear and Rees Jones Furnishers have all closed in last 5 years. Unemployment is serious, reaching 38% in some local villages. Young people, especially school leavers, have had to move away to find jobs elsewhere.
